title: By Your Side
lyrics:
You think I'd leave your side baby
You know me better than that
You think I'd leave down when you're down on your knees
I wouldn't do that
I'll tell you-you're right when you want
Ha ha oh ha ha oh

And if only you could see him to me



Oh when you're cold

I'll be there hold on tight to me

When you're on the outside baby and you can't get in

I will show you you're so much better than you know

When you're lost and you're alone and you can't get back again

I will find you and darling I will bring you home

And if you wanna cry I am here to dry your eyes

And in no time you'll be fine



You think I'd leave your side baby

You know me better than that

You think I'd leave down when you're down on your knees

I wouldn't do that

I'll tell you-you're right when you want

Ha ha oh ha ha oh

And if only you could see him to me



Oh when you're cold

I'll be there hold on tight to me

Oh when you're cold

I'll be there by your side baby

Oh when you're cold

I'll be there hold you tight to me

Oh when you're cold

I'll be there by your side baby

Oooh yeah
